text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With the Arima Kinen fast approaching,<n>Special
Week summons Grass Wonder to<n>one of the
academy's rooftops.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It's there that Special Week declares her<n>
intentions to win.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder accepts the challenge,<n>assuring her
rival that she won't hold<n>anything back either.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Many rivals have accompanied her along<n>this path
she walks, and the challenge<n>ahead will surely
allow her to make<n>another great leap of progress.
